briefTitle: Use of a Cysteine-rich Whey Protein Isolate in Post COVID-19 Cognitive Impairment
officialTitle: Use of a Cysteine-rich Whey Protein Isolate (Immunocal®) in Post COVID-19 Cognitive Impairment

protocolDocument.label: Study Protocol and Statistical Analysis Plan: Summary table of data statistical analysis

eligibilityCriteria.criteria:
Inclusion: - Adults ≥18 years with confirmed prior COVID-19 - with persistent cognitive symptoms - able to complete testing - and willing to consent.

Exclusion: - Pre-existing dementia or major psychiatric illness - whey protein allergy - participation in another cognitive trial - severe hepatic/renal/metabolic disease, pregnancy - or any condition interfering with participation.

primary.description: Cognitive performance will be assessed using a standardized neuropsychological test battery evaluating memory, attention, and executive function. Scores will be compared from baseline to the end of the intervention period.

secondary.description: Functional capacity will be measured by the 30-second sit-to-stand test. The number of repetitions completed will be compared between baseline and study completion.

dataSource: ClinicalTrials.gov API v2 - Ultimate Complete Collection
